articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 11)
articles.description:
ABINGTON 144 Helen Drive. One-family raised ranch, built in 1993, 1,582 square feet, 5 rooms, 3 bedrooms, 3 baths, on 30,038-square-foot lot. $735,000 41 Clapp St. One-family Colonial, built in 1952, 1,472 square feet, 4 rooms, 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, on 7,350-square-foot lot. $550,000 20 Cleverly St. #B2 Condo/Apt, built in 1984, 1,154 square feet, […]

The post Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 11) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Abington home at 144 Helen Drive sold for $735,000 on February 11.
41 Clapp St. Colonial sold for $550,000, highlighting rising property values.
Increased home sales indicate a competitive real estate market in Greater Boston.
